item.description:
Canceling tonight due to threat of scattered thunderstorms!!!
Lets try and Catch Conga Bop at Sunken Garden, will update!!!



Conga Bop At Wadsworth Mansion at Long Hill
Join us for a relaxing evening, bring your lawn chairs and picnic supper, this music is sure to kick the summer into gear!
Concert starts at 6:30

Once again the Friends of Long Hill present their annual summer concert series on the south lawn of the Wadsworth Mansion. We welcome guests to bring a picnic dinner and enjoy an evening with family, friends and great musicians. Grounds open at 5:30 p.m. and the concerts begin at 6:30 p.m. The event is free and you can find free parking at the Mansion, at the Wilbert Snow School: 299 Wadsworth Street, and at Mercy High School: 1740 Randolph Road.
http://www.wadsworthm...


Conga-Bop combines the harmony and sensibilities of hard-bop with the rhythms of the Caribbean to produce an original and vibrant sound that is latin and jazz. Drummer / Vibist / Composer Ed Fast leads this octet through an exciting array of his own soulful originals as well as latin jazz classics by legendary artists such as Cal Tjader, Tito Puente and Hilton Ruiz. This band grooves its way through a multitude of latin rhythms including rumba, cha cha cha, son, and Afro-Cuban 6/8. Enjoy the unique voice of Conga-Bop, a band with a Caribbean heart and hard-bop soul.
http://www.edfastmusi...
item.how_to_find_us: I will fly the Black and white scarf on a pole
item.name: Conga Bop at The Wadsworth Mansion at Long Hill
